page.title: 04RECREATION
page.content: My name is Eon and I am 11. I like BMX freestyling. A BMX is a special sort of 'bike' made for doing tricks and stunts. Mine is a black Super Sport Tornado. My favourite trick is called a 'wilton'. A 'wilton' is when you turn the handlebars 180 degrees, take one hand and foot off, while turning 180 degrees on a trick ramp. We make up our ramps with odd bits and pieces. Favourite activities of other children are watching T.V., visiting the cinema, playing sports such as swimming, squash, badminton in sports clubs. Summer activities include beach and countryside picnics. My name is Claire and I am 11. I often go to the beach with my Mum and Dad to Whitsands Bay.
